original_title: Indian Government is offering over 150 scholarships to Sri Lankan students; Here’s how to apply
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Application are called for the scholarship program offered by the Government of India for 2023/2024.
The Indian High Commission in Colombo said Sri Lankan students can register for the program until the 8th of March 2023.
The Government of India is offering more than 150 fully-paid scholarships to students from Sri Lanka.
The Nehru Memorial Scholarship Scheme will be offering 75 undergraduate scholarships, 10 postgraduate scholarships, and 5 PhD scholarships.
The Moulana Azad Scholarship Scheme will be offering 45 postgraduate scholarships in Engineering, Science, and Agriculture.
The Rajiv Gandhi Scholarship Scheme will be offering 20 undergraduate scholarships in IT, Engineering, and Technology.
